definitions.text: pull the plug of (electrical appliances) and render inoperable
examples: unplug the hair dryer after using it

definitions.text: (music) marked by or composed of disconnected parts or sounds; cut short crisply
having been divided; having the unity destroyed; -Samuel Lubell; - E.B.White
examples: Congress...gave the impression of...a confusing sum of disconnected local forces

definitions.text: marked by sudden changes in subject and sharp transitions
not plugged in or connected to a power source

examples: a confused dream about the end of the world
